fields.name: DataType
fields.description: The (Azure Machine Learning supported) data type of the input column. A list of valid  Azure Machine Learning data types are described at https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dn905923.aspx .

fields.name: MapTo
fields.description: The zero based index of the function parameter this input maps to.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The name of the input column.
